type: Tutorial Step - Drop it like itâ€™s Hot

definition.text: Taking part in governance is a valuable contribution! As such the Airdrop Program rewards you with tokens on every release!

paragraphs.text: We are not a fan of mindless airdrops. However, since you took the time to learn Superalgos and create your User Profile, you deserve a reward!
On the Onboarding Programs node click Add Airdrop Program.
Now you may get up to 1,000 SA tokens at the next Distribution Event and every other future release provided you submit your User Profile!
